bug.author: apiszcz
bug.summary: Documentation Correction: Feature Matching + Homography to find Objects
bug.description:
Suggesting 2 changes for python operation with the new SPLIT contrib packages <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/3.0-beta/doc/py_tutorials/py_feature2d/py_feature_homography/py_feature_homography.html>http://docs.opencv.org/3.0-beta/doc/py_tutorials/py_feature2d/py_feature_homography/py_feature_homography.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>OLD: # Initiate SIFT detector sift = cv2.SIFT() NEW # Initiate SIFT detector sift=cv2.xfeatures2d.SIFT_create()
OLD h,w = img1.shape NEW h,w,d = img1.shape </denchmark-code>
